content.raw:
> The intent is to move the capabilities of https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_openni_kinect.cpp from a ROS plugin directly into simulation.

If you're looking at the Kinetic version of the plugin, you may be interested in [this pull request](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/pull/757) which suggests a more updated approach.
content.html:
The intent is to move the capabilities of https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_plugins/src/gazebo_ros_openni_kinect.cpp from a ROS plugin directly into simulation.

If you're looking at the Kinetic version of the plugin, you may be interested in this pull request which suggests a more updated approach.
